properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token generation (HS512 algorithm requires minimum 512 bits)

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds (default: 24 hours = 86400000)

properties.name: app.upload.dir
properties.description: Directory path for uploading timetable files

properties.name: app.ocr.mock-mode
properties.description: Enable mock mode for OCR (set to true for development without tessdata)
